alert.note: Alert for Henderson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 11:18PM CDT until July 05 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN HANCOCK...SOUTHEASTERN HENDERSON...WARREN... MCDONOUGH AND SOUTHEASTERN MERCER COUNTIES... At 1118 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Galesburg Airport to near Bentley, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Macomb, Monmouth, Carthage, Bushnell, Colchester, La Harpe, Roseville, Blandinsville, Industry, Good Hope, Prairie City, Bardolph, North Henderson, Raritan, Tennessee, Sciota, Western Illinois University, Fandon, Little Swan Lake and New Philadelphia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
